      void shareWith(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> target, java.lang.String path, java.lang.Object def)
      Shares a single value with a target collection:
      - Writes the value from this node to the target if possible
      - Writes the value from the target to this node alternatively
      - If no value was found at all, both the target and this node get the default value
      void trim()
      Trims away all unread values

      • get

        public <T> T get(java.lang.String path,
        T def)
        Gets the raw value at the path as the type specified
        The def value is used to get the type, it can not be null!
        Parameters:
        path - to get at
        def - value to return
        Returns:
        the converted value, or the default value if not found or invalid

      • get

        public <T> T get(java.lang.String path,

        Returns:

      • shareWith

        public void shareWith(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> target,
             java.lang.String path,
             java.lang.Object def)
        Shares a single value with a target collection:
        - Writes the value from this node to the target if possible
        - Writes the value from the target to this node alternatively
        - If no value was found at all, both the target and this node get the default value
        Parameters:
        target - to share the value with
        path - to the value to share
        def - value to use if no value was found
